description:
archive/tar: simplify use of constants in test case.

Replace setsid with c_ISGID since the constant is already defined.

messages.text:
LGTM after change

src/pkg/archive/tar/tar_test.go:51: // see golang.org/issue/4867
This loses its context now.  Let's reword:

// Ignoring c_ISGID for golang.org/issue/4867

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

archive/tar: simplify use of constants in test case.
